I absolutely love Calders!  The food is fantastic, the gin and tonics top-notch, and the atmosphere nothing short of enchanting!  This is the sort of place that I would one day love to live above: Classy, comfortable, friendly!Calders has an amazing Catalan menu, plus some fabulous drinks!  I recommend ordering a vermouth and join some friends on the ample patio on a late Sunday morning.  Few things get that close to perfection in life!
